headline.main: VICHY BUDGET DETAILED; Additional Appropriations Listed in Only Paper Published

lead_paragraph: VICHY, France, May 1 -- The only paper appearing today, May Day, in the unoccupied zone was the Journal Official, which, however, will not be published tomorrow, it being a day of rest for all workers. The newspaper gives details of additional appropriations for the 1940 budget as well as an indication that certain original appropriations can now be canceled, leaving on balance a reduction of the budget by about 7,500,000,000 francs.
